document_data.name: Order of the White Violet
document_data.orgname: the Order of the White Violet
document_data.mainbody: The '''Order of the White Violet''' was an honorary order of dancers devoted to [[Lliira]], the Goddess of Joy.
document_data.History: Each member of the Order of the White Violet was recognized by the [[Church of Lliira]] for their stunning performances involving dance.
